Description: You focus your aura into a concentrated blast that strikes a creature in range. This move is guaranteed to hit for fighting damage, except when targeting a creature in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Dig, Bounce, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
